experience.title: Vice President
experience.description: ENAM Asset Management Company Private Limited (ENAM AMC) is one of India’s premier choice for long-term wealth creation in Indian Equity Market.At ENAM , the focus has been on pioneering strategies for sustainable wealth creation in the Indian Equity Market for offshore investors. The current role encompasses forging overseas strategic alliances that have been pivotal for our growth trajectory.At ENAM, my tenure has been marked by spearheading initiatives for attracting offshore investments and establishing vital overseas alliances. This role has allowed me to leverage my skills, essential in negotiating and managing cross-border relationships. We have successfully positioned ENAM AMC as a trusted entity for international investors seeking opportunities in India's thriving financial landscape.
